title: Polyethylene nanofibres with very high thermal conductivities
title_cn: 具有极高导热率的聚乙烯纳米纤维
abstract: Bulk polymers are generally regarded as thermal insulators, and typically have thermal conductivities on the order of 0.1 W m−1 K−1 (ref. ). However, recent work suggests that individual chains of polyethylene—the simplest and most widely used polymer—can have extremely high thermal conductivity. Practical applications of these polymers may also require that the individual chains form fibres or films. Here, we report the fabrication of high-quality ultra-drawn polyethylene nanofibres with diameters of 50–500 nm and lengths up to tens of millimetres. The thermal conductivity of the nanofibres was found to be as high as ∼104 W m−1 K−1, which is larger than the conductivities of about half of the pure metals. The high thermal conductivity is attributed to the restructuring of the polymer chains by stretching, which improves the fibre quality toward an ‘ideal’ single crystalline fibre. Such thermally conductive polymers are potentially useful as heat spreaders and could supplement conventional metallic heat-transfer materials, which are used in applications such as solar hot-water collectors, heat exchangers and electronic packaging.
abstract_cn: 通常将块状聚合物视为绝热材料，并且通常具有的热导率约为0.1＆＃160; W＆＃160; m ＆＃8722; 1 ＆＃160; K ＆＃8722; 1 （参考。＆＃160;）。但是，最近的工作表明，聚乙烯的单个链最简单，使用最广泛的聚合物可以具有极高的导热率。这些聚合物的实际应用也可能要求各个链形成纤维或薄膜。在这里，我们报告了高质量的超拉伸聚乙烯纳米纤维的制造，该纳米纤维的直径为50＆＃8211; 500 nm，长度可达数十毫米。发现纳米纤维的热导率高达＆＃8764; 104 W m ＆＃8722; 1 ＆＃160; K ＆＃8722; 1 ，它比约一半的纯金属的电导率大。高热导率归因于通过拉伸使聚合物链重构，这改善了朝“理想”纤维的质量。单晶纤维。这种导热聚合物可能会用作散热器，并可以补充常规的金属传热材料，这些材料可用于太阳能热水收集器，热交换器和电子包装等应用中。

title: Complex self-assembled patterns using sparse commensurate templates with locally varying motifs
title_cn: 使用带有局部变化图案的稀疏相称模板进行复杂的自组装图案
abstract: Templated self-assembly of block copolymer thin films can generate periodic arrays of microdomains within a sparse template, or complex patterns using 1:1 templates. However, arbitrary pattern generation directed by sparse templates remains elusive. Here, we show that an array of carefully spaced and shaped posts, prepared by electron-beam patterning of an inorganic resist, can be used to template complex patterns in a cylindrical-morphology block copolymer. We use two distinct methods: making the post spacing commensurate with the equilibrium periodicity of the polymer, which controls the orientation of the linear features, and making local changes to the shape or distribution of the posts, which direct the formation of bends, junctions and other aperiodic features in specific locations. The first of these methods permits linear patterns to be directed by a sparse template that occupies only a few percent of the area of the final self-assembled pattern, while the second method can be used to selectively and locally template complex linear patterns.
abstract_cn: 嵌段共聚物薄膜的模板化自组装可以在稀疏模板或使用1：1模板的复杂图案内生成微区的周期性阵列。但是，由稀疏模板指导的任意模式生成仍然难以捉摸。在这里，我们表明，通过对无机抗蚀剂进行电子束图案化而制备的一系列间隔紧密且形状整齐的柱子，可以用于模板化圆柱状嵌段共聚物中的复杂图案。我们使用两种不同的方法：使柱间距与聚合物的平衡周期性相称，以控制线性特征的方向；对柱的形状或分布进行局部更改，从而指导弯曲，连接和弯曲的形成。在特定位置的其他非周期性特征。第一种方法允许线性图案由稀疏模板控制，该模板仅占最终自组装图案面积的百分之几，而第二种方法可用于选择性地和局部地模板复杂的线性图案。 >

title: Superconductivity in just four pairs of (BETS)2GaCl4 molecules
title_cn: 仅四对（BETS）2GaCl4分子中的超导性
abstract: How small can a sample of superconducting material be and still display superconductivity? This question is relevant to our fundamental understanding of superconductivity, and also to applications in nanoscale electronics, because Joule heating of interconnecting wires is a major problem in nanoscale devices. It has been shown that ultrathin layers of metal can display superconductivity, but any limits on the size of superconducting systems remain a mystery. (BETS)2GaCl4, where BETS is bis(ethylenedithio)tetraselenafulvalene, is an organic superconductor, and in bulk it has a superconducting transition temperature Tc of ∼8 K (ref.) and a two-dimensional layered structure that is reminiscent of the high-Tc cuprate superconductors. Here, we use scanning tunnelling spectroscopy to show that a single layer of (BETS)2GaCl4 molecules on an Ag(111) surface displays a superconducting gap that increases exponentially with the length of the molecular chain. Moreover, we show that a superconducting gap can still be detected for just four pairs of (BETS)2GaCl4 molecules. Real-space spectroscopic images directly visualize the chains of BETS molecules as the origin of the superconductivity.
abstract_cn: 超导材料的样品有多少能显示超导性？这个问题与我们对超导性的基本理解有关，也与纳米级电子产品中的应用有关，因为互连线的焦耳热是纳米级设备中的主要问题。已经表明，金属的超薄层可以显示超导性，但是对超导系统尺寸的任何限制仍然是个谜。 （BETS） 2 GaCl 4 ，其中BETS是双（亚乙基二硫代）四硒富勒烯，是有机超导体，总体上具有超导转变温度T c < / sub> 8 K（参考）和二维分层结构，让人联想到高T c 铜酸盐超导体。在这里，我们使用扫描隧道光谱法显示Ag（111）表面上的（BETS） 2 GaCl 4 分子单层显示出超导间隙，该间隙随分子链的长度。此外，我们表明对于四对（BETS） 2 GaCl 4 分子仍然可以检测到超导间隙。真实空间的光谱图像直接将BETS分子的链可视化为超导性的起源。

title: Proposal for an all-spin logic device with built-in memory
title_cn: 关于具有内置存储器的全旋转逻辑设备的建议
abstract: The possible use of spin rather than charge as a state variable in devices for processing and storing information has been widely discussed, because it could allow low-power operation and might also have applications in quantum computing. However, spin-based experiments and proposals for logic applications typically use spin only as an internal variable, the terminal quantities for each individual logic gate still being charge-based. This requires repeated spin-to-charge conversion, using extra hardware that offsets any possible advantage. Here we propose a spintronic device that uses spin at every stage of its operation. Input and output information are represented by the magnetization of nanomagnets that communicate through spin-coherent channels. Based on simulations with an experimentally benchmarked model, we argue that the device is both feasible and shows the five essential characteristics for logic applications: concatenability, nonlinearity, feedback elimination, gain and a complete set of Boolean operations.
abstract_cn: 自旋而不是电荷作为状态变量在处理和存储信息的设备中的可能用途已被广泛讨论，因为它可以实现低功耗操作，并且还可以在量子计算中应用。但是，基于自旋的实验和针对逻辑应用的建议通常仅将自旋用作内部变量，每个单独逻辑门的端子数量仍基于电荷。这需要使用额外的硬件来抵消自旋到电荷的反复转换，从而抵消了任何可能的优势。在这里，我们提出了一种自旋电子设备，该设备在其操作的每个阶段都使用自旋。输入和输出信息由通过自旋相干通道进行通信的纳米磁铁的磁化强度表示。基于带有实验基准模型的仿真，我们认为该设备既可行，又显示了逻辑应用的五个基本特征：可连接性，非线性，反馈消除，增益和完整的布尔运算集。

title: One-to-one comparison of sunscreen efficacy, aesthetics and potential nanotoxicity
title_cn: 防晒功效，美学和潜在的纳米毒性一对一比较
abstract: Numerous reports have described the superior properties of nanoparticles and their diverse range of applications. Issues of toxicity, workplace safety and environmental impact have also been a concern. Here we show a theoretical comparison of how the size of titanium dioxide nanoparticles and their concentration in sunscreens can affect efficacy, aesthetics and potential toxicity from free radical production. The simulation results reveal that, unless very small nanoparticles can be shown to be safe, there is no combination of particle size and concentration that will deliver optimal performance in terms of sun protection and aesthetics. Such a theoretical method complements well the experimental approach for identifying these characteristics.
abstract_cn: 许多报告描述了纳米颗粒的优越性能及其不同的应用范围。 毒性，工作场所安全和环境影响等问题也令人关注。 在这里，我们显示了钛白粉纳米粒子的大小及其在防晒霜中的浓度如何影响自由基产生的功效，美观性和潜在毒性的理论比较。 仿真结果表明，除非能够证明非常小的纳米颗粒是安全的，否则没有任何大小和浓度的组合可以提供最佳的防晒和美观性能。 这种理论方法很好地补充了识别这些特征的实验方法。

title: Lipid multilayer gratings
title_cn: 脂质多层光栅
abstract: The interaction of electromagnetic waves with matter can be controlled by structuring the matter on the scale of the wavelength of light, and various photonic components have been made by structuring materials using top-down or bottom-up approaches. Dip-pen nanolithography is a scanning-probe-based fabrication technique that can be used to deposit materials on surfaces with high resolution and, when carried out in parallel, with high throughput. Here, we show that lyotropic optical diffraction gratings—composed of biofunctional lipid multilayers with controllable heights between ∼5 and 100 nm—can be fabricated by lipid dip-pen nanolithography. Multiple materials can be simultaneously written into arbitrary patterns on pre-structured surfaces to generate complex structures and devices, allowing nanostructures to be interfaced by combinations of top-down and bottom-up fabrication methods. We also show that fluid and biocompatible lipid multilayer gratings allow label-free and specific detection of lipid–protein interactions in solution. This biosensing capability takes advantage of the adhesion properties of the phospholipid superstructures and the changes in the size and shape of the grating elements that take place in response to analyte binding.
abstract_cn: 可以通过在光的波长范围内构造物质来控制电磁波与物质的相互作用，并且已经通过使用自上而下或自下而上的方法来构造材料来制造各种光子组件。浸笔式纳米光刻技术是一种基于扫描探针的制造技术，可用于以高分辨率将材料沉积在表面上，并在并行执行时以高通量进行沉积。在这里，我们表明，可以通过脂质浸渍笔纳米光刻技术制造由高度可控制的生物功能脂质多层膜组成的溶致光学衍射光栅，该生物功能脂质多层膜的高度可控制在5至100 nm之间。可以将多种材料同时写入到预结构化表面上的任意图案中，以生成复杂的结构和设备，从而允许通过自上而下和自下而上的制造方法相结合来形成纳米结构。我们还显示，流体和生物相容性脂质多层光栅可实现溶液中脂质与蛋白质相互作用的无标记和特异性检测。这种生物传感功能利用了磷脂超结构的粘附特性以及响应于分析物结合而发生的光栅元件的尺寸和形状变化。</ p>

title: Kinetics of antimicrobial peptide activity measured on individual bacterial cells using high-speed atomic force microscopy
title_cn: 使用高速原子力显微镜在单个细菌细胞上测得的抗菌肽活性动力学
abstract: Observations of real-time changes in living cells have contributed much to the field of cellular biology. The ability to image whole, living cells with nanometre resolution on a timescale that is relevant to dynamic cellular processes has so far been elusive. Here, we investigate the kinetics of individual bacterial cell death using a novel high-speed atomic force microscope optimized for imaging live cells in real time. The increased time resolution (13 s per image) allows the characterization of the initial stages of the action of the antimicrobial peptide CM15 on individual Escherichia coli cells with nanometre resolution. Our results indicate that the killing process is a combination of a time-variable incubation phase (which takes seconds to minutes to complete) and a more rapid execution phase.
abstract_cn: 活细胞实时变化的观察为细胞生物学领域做出了巨大贡献。 迄今为止，在与动态细胞过程有关的时间尺度上以纳米分辨率成像整个活细胞的能力还难以捉摸。 在这里，我们研究了一种新型的高速原子力显微镜，用于实时成像活细胞，研究了单个细菌细胞死亡的动力学。 增加的时间分辨率（每个图像13秒）可以以纳米分辨率表征抗菌肽CM15对单个大肠杆菌细胞作用的初始阶段。 我们的结果表明，杀死过程是一个随时间变化的潜伏阶段（需要几秒钟到几分钟才能完成）和一个更快的执行阶段的组合。

title: Identifying single nucleotides by tunnelling current
title_cn: 通过隧道电流识别单个核苷酸
abstract: A major goal in medical research is to develop a DNA sequencing technique that is capable of reading an entire human genome at low cost. Recently, it was proposed that DNA sequencing could be performed by measuring the electron transport properties of the individual nucleotides in a DNA molecule. Here, we report electrical detection of single nucleotides using two configurable nanoelectrodes and show that electron transport through single nucleotides occurs by tunnelling. We also demonstrate statistical identification of the nucleotides based on their electrical conductivity, thereby providing an experimental basis for a DNA sequencing technology based on measurements of electron transport.
abstract_cn: 医学研究的主要目标是开发一种能够以低成本读取整个人类基因组的DNA测序技术。 最近，有人提出可以通过测量DNA分子中各个核苷酸的电子传递性质来进行DNA测序。 在这里，我们报告使用两个可配置的纳米电极的单个核苷酸的电检测，并显示通过单个核苷酸发生电子传输通过隧道效应。 我们还证明了基于核苷酸的电导率的统计鉴定，从而为基于电子传输测量的DNA测序技术提供了实验基础。</ p>

title: Three-dimensional tissue culture based on magnetic cell levitation
title_cn: 基于磁性细胞悬浮的三维组织培养
abstract: Cell culture is an essential tool in drug discovery, tissue engineering and stem cell research. Conventional tissue culture produces two-dimensional cell growth with gene expression, signalling and morphology that can be different from those found in vivo, and this compromises its clinical relevance. Here, we report a three-dimensional tissue culture based on magnetic levitation of cells in the presence of a hydrogel consisting of gold, magnetic iron oxide nanoparticles and filamentous bacteriophage. By spatially controlling the magnetic field, the geometry of the cell mass can be manipulated, and multicellular clustering of different cell types in co-culture can be achieved. Magnetically levitated human glioblastoma cells showed similar protein expression profiles to those observed in human tumour xenografts. Taken together, these results indicate that levitated three-dimensional culture with magnetized phage-based hydrogels more closely recapitulates in vivo protein expression and may be more feasible for long-term multicellular studies.
abstract_cn: 细胞培养是药物发现，组织工程和干细胞研究中必不可少的工具。传统的组织培养产生二维细胞生长，其基因表达，信号传导和形态可能不同于体内发现的基因表达，这损害了其临床相关性。在这里，我们报告了在由金，磁性氧化铁纳米颗粒和丝状噬菌体组成的水凝胶存在下，基于细胞磁悬浮的三维组织培养。通过空间控制磁场，可以控制细胞团的几何形状，并可以在共培养中实现不同细胞类型的多细胞簇集。磁悬浮的人胶质母细胞瘤细胞显示出与人肿瘤异种移植物中观察到的蛋白表达谱相似的蛋白表达谱。综上所述，这些结果表明悬浮的三维培养与基于噬菌体的磁化水凝胶可以更紧密地概括体内蛋白质的表达，对于长期的多细胞研究可能更为可行。

title: Direct seawater desalination by ion concentration polarization
title_cn: 通过离子浓度极化直接海水淡化
abstract: A shortage of fresh water is one of the acute challenges facing the world today. An energy-efficient approach to converting sea water into fresh water could be of substantial benefit, but current desalination methods require high power consumption and operating costs or large-scale infrastructures, which make them difficult to implement in resource-limited settings or in disaster scenarios. Here, we report a process for converting sea water (salinity ∼500 mM or ∼30,000 mg l−1) to fresh water (salinity <10 mM or <600 mg l−1) in which a continuous stream of sea water is divided into desalted and concentrated streams by ion concentration polarization, a phenomenon that occurs when an ion current is passed through ion-selective membranes. During operation, both salts and larger particles (cells, viruses and microorganisms) are pushed away from the membrane (a nanochannel or nanoporous membrane), which significantly reduces the possibility of membrane fouling and salt accumulation, thus avoiding two problems that plague other membrane filtration methods. To implement this approach, a simple microfluidic device was fabricated and shown to be capable of continuous desalination of sea water (∼99% salt rejection at 50% recovery rate) at a power consumption of less than 3.5 Wh l−1, which is comparable to current state-of-the-art systems. Rather than competing with larger desalination plants, the method could be used to make small- or medium-scale systems, with the possibility of battery-powered operation.
abstract_cn: 淡水短缺是当今世界面临的严峻挑战之一。将海水转化为淡水的节能方法可能会带来很多好处，但是当前的海水淡化方法要求高功耗和运营成本或大规模的基础设施，这使其难以在资源有限的环境中或在灾难情况下实施。在此，我们报告了一种将海水（盐度为＆lt876; 500 mM或＆＃8764; 30,000 mg l ＆＃8722; 1 ）的海水转化为淡水（盐度为<10＆＃160; mM或＆lt; 600＆＃160; mg＆＃160; l ＆＃8722; 1 ），其中通过离子浓度极化将连续的海水流分为脱盐流和浓缩流，这种现象会发生当离子电流通过离子选择膜时。在操作过程中，盐和较大的颗粒（细胞，病毒和微生物）都被推离膜（纳米通道或纳米多孔膜），这大大降低了膜污染和盐分积聚的可能性，从而避免了困扰其他膜过滤的两个问题方法。为了实施该方法，制造了一种简单的微流体装置，并显示了它能够以小于3.5 Wh lsup的功耗连续淡化海水（在50％的回收率下99％的除盐率）。 ＆＃8722; 1 ，与当前的最新系统相当。该方法可以与大型海水淡化厂竞争，而可以用于制造小型或中型系统，并有可能由电池供电。

title: Detection of single-molecule H2O2 signalling from epidermal growth factor receptor using fluorescent single-walled carbon nanotubes
title_cn: 使用荧光单壁碳纳米管从表皮生长因子受体检测单分子H2O2信号
abstract: An emerging concept in cell signalling is the natural role of reactive oxygen species such as hydrogen peroxide (H2O2) as beneficial messengers in redox signalling pathways. The nature of H2O2 signalling is confounded, however, by difficulties in tracking it in living systems, both spatially and temporally, at low concentrations. Here, we develop an array of fluorescent single-walled carbon nanotubes that can selectively record, in real time, the discrete, stochastic quenching events that occur as H2O2 molecules are emitted from individual human epidermal carcinoma cells stimulated by epidermal growth factor. We show mathematically that such arrays can distinguish between molecules originating locally on the cell membrane from other contributions. We find that epidermal growth factor induces 2 nmol H2O2 locally over a period of 50 min. This platform promises a new approach to understanding the signalling of reactive oxygen species at the cellular level.
abstract_cn: 细胞信号传导中一个新兴的概念是活性氧，例如过氧化氢（H 2 O 2 ）作为氧化还原信号通路中的有益信使的天然作用。但是，由于在低浓度时空和时间上都无法在生命系统中追踪H 2 O 2 信号的性质，因此感到困惑。在这里，我们开发了一系列荧光单壁碳纳米管，它们可以实时选择性地记录以H 2 O 2 分子形式发生的离散，随机猝灭事件从受表皮生长因子刺激的单个人表皮癌细胞中释放出来。我们从数学上表明，这种阵列可以区分其他来源在细胞膜上局部起源的分子。我们发现，表皮生长因子在50分钟内局部诱导2 nmol H 2 O 2 。该平台有望为了解细胞中活性氧的信号传导提供一种新方法。

title: Erratum: Chemical methods for the production of graphenes
title_cn: 勘误表：生产石墨烯的化学方法
